meanings.sent1: The disfunctional machine kept breaking down.
meanings.sent2: The disfunctional car wouldn't start in the morning.
meanings.sent3: The disfunctional toaster only toasted one side of the bread.
meanings.sent4: Her disfunctional laptop was like a stubborn child refusing to work.
meanings.sent5: The disfunctional clock ticked irregularly, confusing everyone.

meanings.definition: Characterized by impaired or abnormal functioning
meanings.sent2: The disfunctional phone screen displayed strange colors.
meanings.sent3: The disfunctional TV remote changed channels on its own.
meanings.sent4: His disfunctional memory was like a tangled web of thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The disfunctional car engine sputtered and coughed, struggling to start.

meanings.definition: Failing to fulfill a function or purpose
meanings.sent1: The disfunctional umbrella couldn't keep the rain out.
meanings.sent2: The disfunctional lock wouldn't open with the key.
meanings.sent3: The disfunctional pen refused to write a single word.
meanings.sent4: Her disfunctional plan fell apart like a house of cards.
meanings.sent5: The disfunctional alarm clock failed to wake her up in the morning.
